content: Mobile Water Recycling Unit

A portable and self-contained water recycling unit that can be easily transported to job sites to recycle used water on-the-go. The unit uses a multi-stage filtration system to clean the water, ensuring that it is safe and effective for reuse.
Portable, easy-to-use, self-contained, multi-stage filtration system, sustainable
ZipJet, HiPoint, Lavender, Sky Pro, Aquamen
Our unit is the only self-contained and portable solution on the market, making it easy for companies to transport and use anywhere.
Water Tanker Delivery Service

A service that delivers clean water to job sites, reducing the need for window cleaning companies to rely on local water sources. The service uses large tanker trucks to transport water directly to the job site, making it easy to refill water tanks on the spot.
Convenient, reliable, time-saving, sustainable, customizable
GreenLeaf Water, AquaTanker, Water2Go, H2O Solutions, WaterBoy
Our service offers customizable delivery options and can be scheduled for regular or one-time deliveries, making it easy for companies to get the water they need when they need it.
Waterless Cleaning Solution

An eco-friendly and waterless cleaning solution that can effectively clean windows without the need for large amounts of water. The solution is safe for use in all types of weather and can help reduce water usage and overall costs for window cleaning companies.
Eco-friendly, effective, all-weather, cost-saving, easy-to-use
Fish Window Cleaning, Pure Water Cleaning, Shine Windows, Performance Window Cleaning, Glass Doctor
Our waterless solution is the only one on the market that is effective in all types of weather and can help companies reduce their water usage and costs.
High-Pressure Air Cleaning System

A system that uses high-pressure air to clean windows without the need for water. The system can effectively remove dirt, debris, and grime from even the highest floors of buildings, making it an ideal solution for window cleaning in urban areas with limited water access.
High-pressure, efficient, versatile, eco-friendly, low-maintenance
ABC Window Cleaners, AquaClean, Sky High Window Cleaning, ProClean, Elite Window Cleaning
Our high-pressure air cleaning system is the most efficient and versatile solution on the market, making it easy for companies to clean windows without the need for water.
pain_point_description: many high-rise buildings are in urban areas with limited water access, and that can pose a challenge for window cleaning companies that rely on water for cleaning. figuring out a way to efficiently transport and store enough water for the job can be difficult
